## 🚀 Getting Started

We’re thrilled to have you here on this journey into the world of **FastAPI**! 

Whether you're a curious beginner or a seasoned developer looking to upskill, this course will equip you with the knowledge and hands-on experience to master **building APIs** like a pro.

Together, we'll dive into key concepts like asynchronous programming, data validation, and API deployment—helping you sharpen your skills every step of the way.

Each lecture brings theory to life with live coding demos 🎥, and our exercises will give you the chance to apply what you've learned in real-world scenarios. 💡

Everything you need is neatly organized into:

- 📚 **[Lectures](/00_Lectures/index.qmd)**: Theory and live coding examples to boost your understanding.

- 🛠️ **[Exercises](/01_Exercises/index.qmd)**: Hands-on tasks to solidify your skills.

- 🎓 **[Instructor Files](/02_Instructors/index.qmd)**: Teaching resources, including solutions and assessments.

## ✨ New Feature: Audio Overview 
Now, we're taking your learning experience to the next level!

Introducing **Audio Overview**, where you can turn your course materials into engaging audio discussions. 

With just one click, two AI hosts will dive deep into your lecture content, summarizing key points, making insightful connections, and even adding some light banter to keep you hooked. 🎧

You can also download the conversation and listen on the go — perfect for when you're multitasking or need a hands-free study session!

::: {.callout-note}
These discussions stem from the lectures I've uploaded, offering you an interactive method to revisit the course material.


They’re not a complete analysis but will help you reinforce what you’ve learned while keeping things fun!
[More info here](https://notebooklm.google.com/)
:::

Let’s get started and build something amazing together! 💻🎉
